snippet: KLECKNER--Robert G.,Jr., 84, of New York City, died June 14 at home. Devoted husband of Carol; father of Tony (Tania) and Susan (Jonathan Goldstein); grandfather of four. A graduate of Yale College ('54) and Penn Law ('59), Bob was ROTC and served two years in Korea. He had a distinguished legal career on Wall Street, including Sullivan & Cromwell, Goldman Sachs and Johnson & Higgins. Outside work he kept active in Russian history and language, and was a member of the University and Union Clubs. Donations in his honor may be made to an animal shelter of your choice. 1/3
